thread.section_title: Hotel Mistral - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Must for Montparnasse
thread.title_full: Must for Montparnasse - Review of Hotel Mistral, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JESSICA B
title: Must for Montparnasse
text: Well situated hotel in a area excellent for the station, theatres and inexpensive bars and restaurants. Hotel has small but attractive rooms, an excellent breakfasting area, an honesty bar in the evenings and complimentary tea and coffee in the afternoons. Reception were very helpful and recommended an excellent restaurant.
